nullEngine.object

Class RootObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • nullEngine.object.GameObject
      • nullEngine.object.RootObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener

    public class RootObject
extends GameObject
    The root GameObject, created by Layer, don't create directly
    See Also:
    GameObject
